Klasse TurbineYaafiComponentService

java.lang.Object
org.apache.turbine.services.BaseInitable
org.apache.turbine.services.BaseService
org.apache.turbine.services.TurbineBaseService
org.apache.turbine.services.avaloncomponent.TurbineYaafiComponentService
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
org.apache.avalon.framework.activity.Disposable, org.apache.avalon.framework.activity.Initializable, org.apache.avalon.framework.service.ServiceManager, AvalonComponentService, Initable, Service, TurbineServiceProvider
public class TurbineYaafiComponentService extends TurbineBaseService implements AvalonComponentService, org.apache.avalon.framework.activity.Initializable, org.apache.avalon.framework.activity.Disposable
An implementation of Turbine service initializing the YAAFI container
Autor:
Siegfried Goeschl

      public void init() throws InitializationException
      Load all configured components and initialize them. This is a zero parameter variant which queries the Turbine Servlet for its config.

    • get

      public Object get(String roleName) throws InstantiationException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: TurbineServiceProvider
      Returns an instance of the requested service. If the given service is not available/found we throw a RuntimeException since this is less intrusive.
      Angegeben von:
      get in Schnittstelle TurbineServiceProvider
      Parameter:
      roleName - the name of the requested service
      Gibt zurück:
      an instance of the service
      Löst aus:
      InstantiationException - the service could not be instantiated
